options.name: Action : Diverting Strike
options.description: You make an Attack with a Heavy Melee Weapon with a 1d4 Attack Bonus. If you miss, make a seperate Attack with a Light 1-Handed Weapon.

options.name: Weapon Expert
options.description: Gain +1 Smithing and +1 Damage to Attacks with Slashing, Piercing and Crushing Weapons

options.name: Recurring Blows
options.description: When you miss a Creature with a Melee Attack, the next Attack you make before the start of your next turn gains a 1d4 Bonus.

options.name: Reaction : Change Stance
options.description: You can use your Reaction at any point to change your Stance instead of an Action. As part of the Reaction, you can make an Attack with a Melee Weapon with a 1d4 Attack Penalty.

options.name: Free Action : Follow-up
options.description: After making an Attack with a 1 Handed Melee Weapon, you quickly fire an Ultra-Light Ranged Weapon and Reload it if it has an Ammunition Capacity.

options.name: Weapon Master
options.description: Your Ranged Attack, Slashing Attack, Piercing Attack and Bludgeoning Attack Modifier all become equal to your highest value Ranged or Melee Attack Modifier
